name: 尤信程
objective: 本課程將深入探討一項或數項特定之數位信號處理技術。探討的主題:1. 濾波器之設計, 2. 多取樣率信號處理, 3. 分數時間延遲, 4. Sigma/delta A/D 轉換器, 5. 頻譜估測, 6. 定點運算DSP CPU之介紹，定點運算之正規化及溢位之處理, 7. 其他實做之議題。
schedule:
1. Design of digital filters (FIR/IIR)
2. Multi-rate signal processing (with polyphase decomposition & filter banks)
3. Fractional time delay
4. Sigma/delta A/D techniques
5. Linear prediction and spectral estimation
6. Adaptive filters
7. Brief introduction to DSP processors
8. Fixed-point implementation of DSP systems
9. Influences of quantization noise (FFT algorithm)
